item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Health Status
item_prototype.description: The overall health state of the cluster. Possible values are (Ok, Degraded, Unknown, Critical failure, Major failure, Minor failure). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Operational Status
item_prototype.description: The transition period during which a cluster moves from one internal state to another. Possible values are (OK, Degraded, Unknown, Transitioning, Isolated, Not-running). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Health Status
item_prototype.description: The overall health status of the local device. Possible values are (ok, degraded, unknown, non-recoverable error, minor failure, major failure, critical failure). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Operational Status
item_prototype.description: The current operational status information of the local device in the cluster. Possible values are (ok, degraded, unknown, stressed, error, starting).

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Service Status
item_prototype.description: The status of I/O to the local device. Possible values are (running, suspended). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Communication Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the director communication with the VPLEX server. Possible values are (Ok, Busy, No contact, Lost communication, Unknown). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Operational Status
item_prototype.description: The functional state of the director in the cluster. Possible values are (Ok, Stopping, Starting, Stopped, Unknown).[FOR_INTEGRATION]

trigger_prototype.name: Обнаружена повышенная загрузка CPU на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено повышенное количество операций записи на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено повышенное количество операций чтения на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено повышенное количество отказов на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено повышенное среднее время выполнения операций записи на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено повышенное среднее время выполнения операций чтения на директоре {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено превышение показаний датчика напряжения директора {#VPLEX_NAME}
Обнаружено превышение показаний температурного датчика директора {#VPLEX_NAME}

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Health Status
item_prototype.description: The overall health state of the engine. Possible values are (Ok, Departure (non contact) , Degraded, Shutdown, Initializing, Expelled). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Operational Status
item_prototype.description: The current operational status of the engine. Possible values are (Online, Degraded, Unknown, Error, Starting or lost comms). [FOR_INTEGRATION]

trigger_prototype.name: Обнаружено отклонение от нормальной скорости вращения вентилятора {#VPLEX_NAME}

item_prototype.name: [{#VPLEX_PARENT}{#VPLEX_NAME} ({#VPLEX_TYPE})] Operational Status
item_prototype.description: The performance status of all Fibre Channel ports on the directors in a cluster. Possible values are (OK, Pending , Suspended, Hardware error).

trigger_prototype.name: Обнаружено превышение показаний температурного датчика сетевого питания {#VPLEX_NAME}
